order_date.description: The date the order was made on.

order_type.description: Type of the order. D - Digital order, meant for the wholesaler, I - Order was sold directly and the sale was verfied trough FURS, InvoceData present in response

sequential_number.description: Sequential number of the item on the order list

item_code.description: id/code of the product, assigned by wholesalers themselves

name.example: Pivo Czech Royal Beer Gold 0,33l steklenica

price_for_unit_no_vat.description: Price of a single unit without VAT

price.description: Price of a single unit with VAT

price_for_vat.description: Price of the whole order without VAT

price_vat_included.description: Price of the whole order with VAT

vat_price.description: VAT value of the whole order

date_time.description: Date and time of when the invoice was created

operator_tax_number.description: Tax number of the operator who made the order

unique_invoice_id.description: Unique invoice ID sent back from the FURS

business_premise_id.description: Premisse ID from where the order was made

electronic_device_id.description: Electronic device ID on which the order was made

taxable.description: 0- Ni davčni zavezanec, 1 - je davčni zavezanec
